title: Microsoft CDM(Common Data Model) Account

cdm:accountCategoryCode.title: Account Category Code
cdm:accountCategoryCode.description: Select a category to indicate whether the customer account is standard or preferred.

cdm:accountClassificationCode.title: Account Classification Code
cdm:accountClassificationCode.description: Select a classification code to indicate the potential value of the customer account based on the projected return on investment, cooperation level, sales cycle length or other criteria.

cdm:businessTypeCode.title: Business Type Code
cdm:businessTypeCode.description: Select the legal designation or other business type of the account for contracts or reporting purposes.

cdm:createdBy.title: Created By
cdm:createdBy.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the record.

cdm:createdByExternalParty.title: Created By External Party
cdm:createdByExternalParty.description: Shows the external party who created the record.

cdm:createdOn.title: Created On
cdm:createdOn.description: Date and time when the record was created.

cdm:createdOnBehalfBy.title: Created On Behalf By
cdm:createdOnBehalfBy.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.

cdm:customerSizeCode.title: Customer Size Code
cdm:customerSizeCode.description: Select the size category or range of the account for segmentation and reporting purposes.

cdm:customerTypeCode.title: Customer Type Code
cdm:customerTypeCode.description: Select the category that best describes the relationship between the account and your organization.

cdm:emailAddress1.title: Email Address1
cdm:emailAddress1.description: Type the primary email address for the account.

cdm:emailAddress2.title: Email Address2
cdm:emailAddress2.description: Type the secondary email address for the account.

cdm:emailAddress3.title: Email Address3
cdm:emailAddress3.description: Type an alternate email address for the account.

cdm:exchangeRate.title: Exchange Rate
cdm:exchangeRate.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

cdm:followEmail.title: Follow Email
cdm:followEmail.description: Information about whether to allow following email activity like opens, attachment views and link clicks for emails sent to the account.

cdm:ftpSiteUrl.title: Ftpsite Url
cdm:ftpSiteUrl.description: Type the url for the account's ftp site to enable users to access data and share documents.

cdm:importSequenceNumber.title: Import Sequence Number
cdm:importSequenceNumber.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

cdm:lastOnHoldTime.title: Laston Hold Time
cdm:lastOnHoldTime.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

cdm:lastUsedInCampaign.title: Last Used In Campaign
cdm:lastUsedInCampaign.description: Shows the date when the account was last included in a marketing campaign or quick campaign.

cdm:masterId.title: Master Id
cdm:masterId.description: shows the master account that the account was merged with.

cdm:merged.title: Merged
cdm:merged.description: Shows whether the account has been merged with another account.

cdm:modifiedBy.title: Modified By
cdm:modifiedBy.description: Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.

cdm:modifiedByExternalParty.title: Modified By External Party
cdm:modifiedByExternalParty.description: Shows the external party who modified the record.

cdm:modifiedOn.title: Modified On
cdm:modifiedOn.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

cdm:modifiedOnBehalfBy.title: Modified On Behalf By
cdm:modifiedOnBehalfBy.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.

cdm:onHoldTime.title: On Hold Time
cdm:onHoldTime.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

cdm:overriddenCreatedOn.title: Overridden Created On
cdm:overriddenCreatedOn.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

cdm:owningBusinessUnit.title: Owning Business Unit
cdm:owningBusinessUnit.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

cdm:owningTeam.title: Owning Team
cdm:owningTeam.description: unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

cdm:participatesInWorkflow.title: Participates In Workflow
cdm:participatesInWorkflow.description: for system use only. Legacy microsoft dynamics crm 3.0 workflow data.

cdm:paymentTermsCode.title: Payment Terms Code
cdm:paymentTermsCode.description: Select the payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount.

cdm:preferredAppointmentDayCode.title: Preferred Appointment Day Code
cdm:preferredAppointmentDayCode.description: Select the preferred day of the week for service appointments.

cdm:primaryContactId.title: Primary Contact Id
cdm:primaryContactId.description: Choose the primary contact for the account to provide quick access to contact details.

cdm:processId.title: Process Id
cdm:processId.description: shows the id of the process.

cdm:sharesOutstanding.title: Shares Outstanding
cdm:sharesOutstanding.description: Type the number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

cdm:shippingMethodCode.title: Shipping Method Code
cdm:shippingMethodCode.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to the account's address to designate the preferred carrier or other delivery option.

cdm:sLAId.title: Sla Id
cdm:sLAId.description: Choose the service level agreement (sla) that you want to apply to the account record.

cdm:sLAInvokedId.title: Sla Invoked Id
cdm:sLAInvokedId.description: Last sla that was applied to this case. This field is for internal use only.

cdm:stageId.title: Stage Id
cdm:stageId.description: Shows the id of the stage.

cdm:stateCode.title: State Code
cdm:stateCode.description: Shows whether the account is active or inactive. Inactive accounts are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

cdm:stockExchange.title: Stock Exchange
cdm:stockExchange.description: Type the stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company.

cdm:telephone1.title: Telephone1
cdm:telephone1.description: Type the main phone number for this account.

cdm:telephone2.title: Telephone2
cdm:telephone2.description: Type a second phone number for this account.

cdm:telephone3.title: Telephone3
cdm:telephone3.description: Type a third phone number for this account.

cdm:tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
cdm:tickerSymbol.description: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from msn money.

cdm:timeSpentByMeOnEmailAndMeetings.title: Time Spent By Me On Email And Meetings
cdm:timeSpentByMeOnEmailAndMeetings.description: Total time spent for emails (read and write) and meetings by me in relation to account record.

cdm:transactionCurrencyId.title: Transaction Currency Id
cdm:transactionCurrencyId.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

cdm:utcConversionTimeZoneCode.title: Utc Conversion Timezone Code
cdm:utcConversionTimeZoneCode.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

cdm:yomiName.title: Yomi Name
cdm:yomiName.description: Type the phonetic spelling of the company name, if specified in japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls and other communications.

cdm:aging30Base.title: Aging 30 Base
cdm:aging30Base.description: The base currency equivalent of the aging 30 field.

cdm:aging60Base.title: Aging 60 Base
cdm:aging60Base.description: The base currency equivalent of the aging 60 field.

cdm:aging90Base.title: Aging 90 Base
cdm:aging90Base.description: The base currency equivalent of the aging 90 field.

cdm:creditLimit.title: Credit Limit
cdm:creditLimit.description: Type the credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

cdm:creditLimitBase.title: Credit Limit Base
cdm:creditLimitBase.description: Shows the credit limit converted to the system's default base currency for reporting purposes.

cdm:creditOnHold.title: Credit On Hold
cdm:creditOnHold.description: Select whether the credit for the account is on hold. This is a useful reference while addressing the invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

cdm:marketCap.title: Market Cap
cdm:marketCap.description: Type the market capitalization of the account to identify the company's equity, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

cdm:marketCapBase.title: Market Cap Base
cdm:marketCapBase.description: Shows the market capitalization converted to the system's default base currency.

cdm:revenueBase.title: Revenue Base
cdm:revenueBase.description: Shows the annual revenue converted to the system's default base currency. The calculations use the exchange rate specified in the currencies area.

cdm:preferredAppointmentTimeCode.title: Preferred Appointment Time Code
cdm:preferredAppointmentTimeCode.description: Select the preferred time of day for service appointments.

cdm:preferredContactMethodCode.title: Preferred Contact Method Code
cdm:preferredContactMethodCode.description: Select the preferred method of contact.

cdm:preferredSystemUserId.title: Preferred System Userid
cdm:preferredSystemUserId.description: Choose the preferred service representative for reference when you schedule service activities for the account.

cdm:fax.title: Address1 Fax
cdm:fax.description: Type the fax number associated with the customer's address.

cdm:telephone1.title: Address1 Telephone1
cdm:telephone1.description: Type the primary phone number for the customer's address.

cdm:telephone2.title: Address1 Telephone2
cdm:telephone2.description: Type a second phone number for the customer's address.

cdm:telephone3.title: Address1 Telephone3
cdm:telephone3.description: Type a third phone number for the customer's address.

cdm:freightTermsCode.title: Address1 Freight Terms Code
cdm:freightTermsCode.description: Select the freight terms to make sure shipping charges are processed correctly.

cdm:name.title: Address1 Name
cdm:name.description: Type a descriptive name for the customer's address, such as corporate headquarters.

cdm:primaryContactName.title: Address1 Primarycontactname
cdm:primaryContactName.description: Type the name of the primary contact person for the customer's address.

cdm:shippingMethodCode.title: Address1 Shippingmethod Code
cdm:shippingMethodCode.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

cdm:UPSZone.title: Address1 Upszone
cdm:UPSZone.description: Type the ups zone of the customer's address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by ups.

cdm:utcOffset.title: Address1 Utcoffset
cdm:utcOffset.description: Select the time zone for the address.

cdm:fax.title: Address2 Fax
cdm:fax.description: Type the fax number associated with the customer's address.

cdm:telephone1.title: Address2 Telephone1
cdm:telephone1.description: Type the primary phone number for the customer's address.

cdm:telephone2.title: Address2 Telephone2
cdm:telephone2.description: Type a second phone number for the customer's address.

cdm:telephone3.title: Address2 Telephone3
cdm:telephone3.description: Type a third phone number for the customer's address.

cdm:freightTermsCode.title: Address2 Freight Terms Code
cdm:freightTermsCode.description: Select the freight terms to make sure shipping charges are processed correctly.

cdm:name.title: Address2 Name
cdm:name.description: Type a descriptive name for the customer's address, such as corporate headquarters.

cdm:primaryContactName.title: Address2 Primarycontactname
cdm:primaryContactName.description: Type the name of the primary contact person for the customer's address.

cdm:shippingMethodCode.title: Address2 Shippingmethod Code
cdm:shippingMethodCode.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

cdm:UPSZone.title: Address2 Upszone
cdm:UPSZone.description: Type the ups zone of the customer's address to make sure shipping charges are calculated correctly and deliveries are made promptly, if shipped by ups.

cdm:utcOffset.title: Address2 Utcoffset
cdm:utcOffset.description: Select the time zone for the address.
